Dice Mechanics

May 04, 2016

My next blog post will (most likely) be about how the dice work in Dungeons of Olde, and why I chose to use them that way. But to test the Blog index page and the blog-to-blog links, I needed at least two posts—that’s why you’re looking at this placeholder right now.
